hadiths.text: Anas said when some meat was brought to the Prophet (SAWS), he asked What is this? He was told this is a thing (meat), which was given as sadaqah to Barirah. Thereupon, he said it is sadaqah for her and a gift to us

chapter.ara-name: باب الْفَقِيرِ يُهْدِي لِلْغَنِيِّ مِنَ الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: A Poor Man Can Give A Gift From The Sadaqah To A Rich Man
